sections.title: Your subscription has been cancelled!
p: We would like to thank you for supporting our projects â€” School++ and KOWO. We are very grateful for every donation you made. Your help has truly helped us grow and develop.

We understand that cancelling your subscription is your personal choice, and we respect that. We would be happy if you could come back to us in the future. After all, it is thanks to our donors that we continue to exist and help others.
Once again, thank you and best wishes!
